title: How to disable Intel Rapid Storage Technology - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is a screenshot of my Intel Rapid Storage Technology desktop app.  Below is the screenshot in the pdf I mentioned (http://download.asrock.com/manual/raid/Z87%20Extreme4/IntelSmartResponse/English.pdf)  So I don't have this Accelerate tab. How do I disable the Rapid Storage Technology?
